knimeNode.name: Wait-for-time
knimeNode.shortDescription: Wait-for-time node. Will wait until a specified time period has elapsed.

intro.p: Delay node, which will run until a specified time period has elapsed. The user can specify the time delay (dd:hh:mm:ss) after which the node will complete. The node will execute until that time is reached.

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

tab.name: Expiry time
tab.option: The time period after which execution will finish (dd:hh:mm:ss)
